    <revision>

      <text xml:space="preserve">The GNU Science library has been mapped against Ruby and Perl with [[ASciLib]] - some 1800 functions!

Check the current list of mapped GSL [http://github.com/pjotrp/ascilib/blob/master/src/mappings/swig/gsl_common.i modules].

Here is a quick [http://github.com/pjotrp/ascilib/blob/master/src/mappings/swig/perl/test/test_gsl.pl Perl example].

Here is a quick [http://github.com/pjotrp/ascilib/blob/master/src/mappings/swig/ruby/test/test_gsl.rb Ruby example].

Note that the initial mapping is derived from Jonathan Leto's Math::GSL - which is included into ASciLib as a git submodule.</text>
